thread.title: 'We want the same thing' - Saudi oil minister welcomes Trump era
thread.title_full: 'We want the same thing' - Saudi oil minister welcomes Trump era

title: 'We want the same thing' - Saudi oil minister welcomes Trump era
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device 'We want the same thing' - Saudi oil minister welcomes Trump era 1 February 2017 Last updated at 06:06 GMT 
Saudi Oil Minister Khalid al-Falih has told the BBC's Chief International Correspondent Lyse Doucet he is pleased that US President Donald Trump plans to pursue a more fossil fuel-oriented energy policy. 
He insisted he was unconcerned by Mr Trump's promise to pursue energy independence and said Saudi Arabia had invested billions of dollars in the American oil industry. Related Topics
